original_title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Satanic Rites Of Dracula
overview: A revamping, if you will, of the 1980's classic horror movie showcase, hosted by Elvira, Mistress of the Dark. Elvira decides that the film she's hosting is so boring that she catches up on her reading and various personal chores.
title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Satanic Rites Of Dracula
